headline.main: About New York; Life Lessons, As Taught By the Dead

docs.lead_paragraph: The worth of God's children transcends their contribution to society. That essential point made, some people seem more useful dead than alive. There is the man nicknamed Red because he looked like Redd Fox, the one called Kris because his obesity recalled Kris Kringle and the one known as George because there was a tag on his arm saying his last name was Washington.
